backgroundStory: Rapid Raven never aimed for fame; the world kept finding them. People noticed the way tools behaved around them—especially under pressure. Everything changed during the Frozen Dawn, when Turbo Seal stepped across the line. Grumpy Construct reminds them that speed without sense is just noise. No banners. No speeches. Just the work.

Everything changed during the Hivemind Murmur, when Odd Bear stepped across the line. Electric Detective reminds them that speed without sense is just noise. The path ahead is narrow but lit enough for one more step.
